ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 88
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a way, Well, It works for me to get the knight to Spawn( only to have a SK come and HT then go back invis after he looted the BIBS). Let me guess you
ygData.messageBody:
There is a way, Well, It works for me to get the knight to Spawn( only to
have a SK come and HT then go back invis after he looted the BIBS). Let me
guess you where pulling all the spawns from the Crystal Hidden Room. A
Ranger Showed me how to get the Knight to spawn in 1-12 Kills. But it does
take about hour to do. I did it that way last night and on the 8th kill, he
spawned.

Rakasta Drache'Morder

----- Original Message -----
From: Robin McCaig <twister@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, August 09, 1999 9:03 AM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Digest Number 88


> From: "Robin McCaig" <twister@...>
>
> We camped the BIBS in runnyeye last night for 6 hours straight and the
> knight never spawned. Anyone else have this problem?
> Twisterkahn
>
